boardgame.name: Fertig!
Fini!
Finished!
Klus Geklaard!
¡Terminado!
boardgame.description: Finished! is a puzzle-solving game, a completely new way to play solitaire!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;It is a typical day at work. Your working schedule is chaotic as always and it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;lsquo;s time to focus on the task at hand. Start sorting files and do not fall asleep. If you require a jolt of caffeine or rush of sugar, there is a limited supply of coffee and a small stash of sweets to help complete your tasks and get finished!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;You start Finished! with a shuffled deck of 48 cards and try to sort these cards by cycling through the draw stack during eight rounds. You may sort cards only in your _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;present_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; area, but helpful actions will let you manipulate your cards in many different ways. If you sort all cards starting from card 00:01 up to card 00:48, you win the game! If this is too easy for you, the game offers four difficulty levels._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Whether or not you win the game, we will invite you to watch a short movie at the end of the game!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Played a few times, but in very good condition. Almost no wear _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; tear!
